text: Dare ga, ten to ji o sozo shita no ka. Mata dare ga anata gata no tame ni, ten kara ame o furaseru no ka. Sorede ware wa, utsukushi kaju-en o oi shigera seru. Soko no jumoku o seicho sa seru koto wa, anata gata ni wa dekinai. Arra to tomoni (sore ga dekiru soto no) kami ga arou ka. Iya, kare-ra wa (tadashi michi kara) hazureta mindearu
